metadata.synopsis: A woman (Elizabeth Taylor) flies to Rome on a reckless quest, not for love but for death.

reviews: Fans of Taylor may like this, but they would have to be a group with amazingly low standards.
A must see for Liz Taylor fans and for those who love bad movies.
Hilariously ghastly camp that rivals the likes of Valley of the Dolls or Mommie Dearest with its wild, no-holds-barred over-the-top lunacy.
